alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 05 at 2:21PM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 25 to 30 feet. * WHERE...All beaches and shorelines of Curry, Coos, and Douglas counties. The most extreme conditions are expected at and south of Cape Blanco. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Extremely large breaking waves will create very hazardous conditions along beaches and area shorelines. Waves will inundate beaches and surge into normally dry areas. Infrastructure damage and significant beach erosion can be expected. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Beaches and coastlines will become hazardous due to very large and life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of beaches, rocks, jetties,piers, and other waterside infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
